Title: The Uncertainty Principle
Writer: Agustina Bessa-Luís (novel), Manoel de Oliveira, Jacques Parsi (collaboration), Júlia Buisel (collaboration), António Costa (collaboration)
Actors: Leonor Baldaque, Leonor Silveira, Isabel Ruth, Ricardo Trêpa
Plot: Having lost her place among the social elite, a widow remarries and starts a family.
